channel.title: Clock and wave playback in sync
channel.description:
Hi there.
I am running some backing tracks using wave/play stereo in 126 bpm and want do some sequencing using midi/out/clock. The wave files are 48khz and the clock is set to 12.6, and the two are not at all in sync.
How do I get a sync which matches wavefile playback?
Cheers
Mikkel

item.title: Clock and wave playback in sync
item.dc:creator: @trummerschlunk
item.description:
@trummerschlunk wrote:

Hi, did you make any progress on this topic?
I would like to play a stereo backing track in sync with a corresponding midi file. (both exported from ableton live)
Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Clock and wave playback in sync

Hi there.

I am running some backing tracks using wave/play stereo in 126 bpm and want do some sequencing using midi/out/clock.
The wave files are 48khz and the clock is set to 12.6, and the two are not at all in sync.
